collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (13 total Queries, 13 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT a.*, d.department_name, s.status_name FROM applications a LEFT JOIN departments d ON d.id = a.department_id LEFT JOIN application_status s ON s.id = a.status_id WHERE a.id = '3'
SELECT t.* FROM technologies t INNER JOIN application_technologies at ON t.id = at.technology_id WHERE at.application_id = '3'
